channel.title: [req] mask
channel.description:
heya, well basically i just need someone who is good with recolours, all i want is a purple hween mask and some recolours of flared pants i got the ints here, any colour of the pants will be good, (thanks in advance if any one can help) if anything blk would be cool
[code]if(i == 9019) // Your desired item id { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 13001; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 13002; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 13003; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 2151; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 429; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1189; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = 7; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = 5; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Flared Pants"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of flared trousers".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
thanks, as i fail with models =/
gary
